pageContext.claim: “I said that refugees are coming in and they promise him more than they give our citizens. They said, 'We're going to give you health care. We're going to give you a free education. And every refugee that comes in will get a free Rolls-Royce.' And CNN went crazy. They said, 'President Trump lied. They're not getting a Rolls-Royce,' you know? True. They took it very seriously. You can't be sarcastic.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump at various times complained about receiving Pinocchios or being called a liar by CNN for saying undocumented immigrants would receive Rolls-Royces. Actually, the Pinocchios were for his claim that Democrats wanted to give immigrant driver's licenses. We -- and CNN -- noted that he later said he was joking about the luxury cars.
